snippet.title: Risen 2: Dark Waters - Air Temple Trailer [North America]
snippet.description:
Uncover the mysteries of the Air Temple in this exclusive new adventure for the pirate RPG Risen 2: Dark Waters!
Gargoyles have infested the world of Risen 2: Dark Waters. The nameless hero will explore the mysterious Air Temple to uncover the mystery that surrounds it.
"The Air Temple" DLC offers an additional island with new characters, quests and enemies.
This DLC is available for a price of EUR 9,99 / $ 9.99 / £ 7.99. 

ESRB RATING: MATURE with Blood, Strong Language, Use of Alcohol, Violence. Visit www.esrb.org for rating information.
